title: My Life Story (2010)
description:
Description
Start your path to success and survive the ordeals of young adulthood in My Life Story, a fun and rewarding life simulation experience.
Recently graduated from high school, but still living in your parent's basement, real life is knocking at your door with the promise of what may be. But without a job, your mom taking away your car, and the need to find a place of your own, that promise is turning more into an ill fate. It's time to get your life on track and start making the decisions that will determine your future. Can you balance work, fun, health, and bills to make your life a real virtual success? 
Take on the challenges of modern day life as you find a job, move into an apartment, and work your way through the collegiate ranks. Explore the town and participate in over 50 activities like dancing, jogging, watching movies, or simply eating. Earn money to purchase home furnishings, pay for school and rent. Win Life Cards to equip helpful bonuses, but keep your eye on your activities, or you could end up in the hospital!

System Requirements
OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
CPU: 1.0 GHz
RAM: 512 MB
DirectX: 9.0c
Hard Drive: 54 MB

Installation
1. Run installer "My Life Story.exe".
2. Play using shortcut on dekstop.
3. Enjoy & Seed!
